孽.definition: son born of a concubine; disaster; sin; evil

孽子.definition: unfilial son; unworthy son; illegitimate son; concubine's son

孽海花.definition: A Flower in a Sinful Sea, late-Qing novel by Jin Tianhe 金天翮[Jin1 Tian1he2] and Zeng Pu 曾樸|曾朴[Zeng1 Pu3]

孽畜.definition: evil creature (multipurpose curse); evil domestic animal

孽種.definition: bane of one's existence; vile spawn
